verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and prophesy against <S%H5012>it,<s%>

and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>it,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H2022>Behold,<s%> I am against you, Mount <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H5414>you,<s%> and I will make you a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and an <S%H8077>astonishment.<s%>
I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste,<s%> and you shall be <S%H8077>desolate;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Because you have had a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H342>enmity,<s%> and have <S%H5064>given<s%> over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity,<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H7093>end;<s%>

<S%H2416>therefore,<s%> as I live, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> I will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> you for <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H518>you:<s%> since you have not <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> therefore <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall pursue <S%H7291>you.<s%>

Thus will I <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H8077>an<s%> <S%H8077>astonishment<s%> and a <S%H8077>desolation;<s%> and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from it him who passes through and him who <S%H7725>returns.<s%>

I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> its <S%H2022>mountains<s%> with its <S%H2491>slain:<s%> in your <S%H1389>hills<s%> and in your <S%H1516>valleys<s%> and in all your <S%H650>watercourses<s%> shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> who are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and your <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall not be <S%H7725>inhabited;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Because you have <S%H559>said,<s%> These <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%> shall be <S%H3423>mine,<s%> and we will possess <S%H3068>it;<s%> whereas Yahweh was there:

<S%H2416>therefore,<s%> as I live, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> according to your <S%H639>anger,<s%> and according to your <S%H7068>envy<s%> which you have <S%H6213>shown<s%> out of your <S%H8135>hatred<s%> against <S%H3045>them;<s%> and I will make myself known among <S%H8199>them,<s%> when I shall judge you.

You shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H8085>heard<s%> all your <S%H5007>insults<s%> which you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> against the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> They are laid <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> they have been <S%H5414>given<s%> us to <S%H402>devour.<s%>
You have <S%H1431>magnified<s%> yourselves against me with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and have <S%H6280>multiplied<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> against <S%H8085>me:<s%> I have heard it.
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> When the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices,<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H8077>desolate.<s%>

As you <S%H8057>rejoiced<s%> over the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> because it was <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> so will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H8077>you:<s%> you shall be desolate, <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> and all <S%H123>Edom,<s%> even all of <S%H3045>it;<s%> and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
